body.description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New system is better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good xbox console but it has a few problems...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this xbox last year as a early birthday present to myself and it only took me a few minutes to get everything hooked up and get all my info on my xbox. I am bummed out cause i can't hook this xbox up to my laptop(internet connection issues) cause i was gonna do some recordings of me play a few games. I noticed that a few of my games do tend to glitch every so often especially 1 game that i have no choice but to skip alot of cutscenes or my xbox will freeze up and after a few minutes of seeing if it will bounce back and me continue playing as usual it will stay frozen leaing me to unhook my xbox for a few minutes then rehook it and replay what i just did. A certain sound it makes when it is about to freeze/glitch up. I need to upgrade someday to an xbox one console but until that time i am stuck with this console.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: we just opened this on Christmas morning for my son who was so excited for this product and hooked it up. The screen immediately stopped working, it's not reading a disk and now it won't even turn on and has a constant red light. I'm irate. This was supposed to be a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Looks and what's included
reviews.reviewText: So after dealing with gamestop used and renewed products, my hopes wasn'thigh for this xbox. Opened the box to see everything individually wrapped in bubble wrap, after removing the wrapping I noticed the systems itself was in amazing condition for its age. No cracks or deep scratches, and no broken plastic trim pieces. Came with power inverter and cord, new Amazon basics hdmi cable, controler is used but tight enough for me, even 2 new AA batteries. What really surprised me is seeing a 250gb internal HDD already inside the system after seeing reviews stating theirs came without one. So far everything's great the first day, so if you're on the fence about buying used systems, just roll the dice and see what you get. Worst comes to worst it's a POS or missing parts and you send it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything was great but wireless controller needs new battery pack but everything else was great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 18 year old son asked me to buy this for Christmas in 2022. We were amazed at the condition when it arrived since it looked like it was brand new out of the box!!We had only expected to receive the Xbox gaming system as listing described but much to our surprise and delight it also arrived with 2 wireless controllers, and a bunch of games that were some of my sons absolute favorites in completely like new condition (there was one that had like 2 marks on the disk but they weren’t scratches)!! I want to say there may have been a couple of other things in there my son was excited to see since he had expected to have to go buy.I waited a few months before reviewing to make sure everything kept working and it wasn’t just a pretty package and it’s still operating like new!!Highly recommend this seller!Arrived super quick, packaged well, and I will happily buy from again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought I was getting a deal and then I learned that I could have bought o refurbished Xbox one for the same amount or less and been able to play both xbox360 and Xbox one games on the same console. Wasn't happy 😕.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not come with needed plugs but works just fine....
reviews.reviewText: The xbox worked fine after I ordered the cables to hook it up to HDMI and the charger wires for the controller, which did not come in the original order. The Xbox came with RCA jacks, which anyone with a smart tv knows will not work. Also, the controller battery was dead and it did not come with charging cables for the controller. I ordered the HDMI hookup and charging cables at an additional $40 and the Xbox now works just fine. Buyer beware, those cables are not included.
